com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl

Class ZendeskSdkSettingsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl.ZendeskService
      • com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl.ZendeskSdkSettingsService

  • public class ZendeskSdkSettingsService
extends ZendeskService
    This is a concrete class that wraps the SdkSettingsService which is used to retrieve Settings from your Zendesk instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getSdkSettings

        @Deprecated
public void getSdkSettings(String deviceLocale,
                             String applicationId,
                             ZendeskCallback<SdkSettings> callback)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the SdkSettings from the Zendesk instance.

        Deprecated. Please use getSettings(String, String, ZendeskCallback)

        Parameters:
        deviceLocale - The locale of the device in the format of ll-cc. en-us, en-ca. The country is optional so locale strings like en, de and fr are also valid.
        applicationId - The application id for your application, as set on the Lotus web interface
        callback - A callback with the settings or an error response

      • getSettings

        public void getSettings(String deviceLocale,
               String applicationId,
               ZendeskCallback<MobileSettings> callback)
        Gets the MobileSettings from the Zendesk instance.

        The MobileSettings class contains settings related to the Mobile SDK in MobileSettings.getSdkSettings(). It also contains higher level Zendesk settings in MobileSettings.getAccountSettings().

        Parameters:
        deviceLocale - The locale of the device in the format of ll-cc. en-us, en-ca. The country is optional so locale strings like en, de and fr are also valid.
        applicationId - The application id for your application, as set on the Lotus web interface
        callback - A callback with the settings or an error response
